revision.text:
[[File:FarmPoint.png|thumb|200px|A Farm Point]] ==Details== ===Description=== Farm Points are gained by harvesting [[Berries]] (withering does not grant farm points) on the [[Farm]]. Different types of berries give differing amounts Farm Points. Farm Points can be used to buy: [[Masterball|Masterballs]] at the Pok√©mon League, [[Farm Items]] at the [[Berry Master|Berry Masters]], 1 of some exclusive Berries in [[Challenge Mode|Challenge Modes]], the one-time purchase and upgrades of the [[Squirtbottle]], and [[Sprinklotad]]. Farm Points are also used for purchasing some [[Farm#Farm Hands|Farm Hands]], and are used to employ all Farm Hands once purchased. ===Farm Points Earned=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Berry !! Farm Points
per Second !! Total berries
per harvest !! Total Farm Point
per harvest !! Total time till ripe
